lenders.name: Andrew von Gregor
lenders.loan_because:
When I was a child, my family and I were very, very poor. My late father was a violent alcoholic and for some time we were homeless and car-less, too. Thankfully, various people helped us along the way (strangers mostly), and eventually we [my mother, three younger siblings and I] were no longer in that awful situation.

I loan here at Kiva because I can, and because I believe this is a wonderful concept brought to reality to help people caught in the mire of poverty, and thus make this world a better place for everyone.

You always hear people say, "Someone should do something about that [problem in the world]." Well, I am someone and--with the help of Kiva.org--I am doing something. (...And if you are able to be online and read this, so should YOU!)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional composer and guitarist living in Hollywood, CA.

lenders.name: Beems
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all beings deserve happiness, security, and health.
lenders.occupational_info: teaching people how to breath, move and relax

lenders.name: R&J
lenders.loan_because: This is the way the world turns

Step 3) Profit!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Life's been good to me, so I'm just trying to spread it around.
lenders.occupational_info: I give people beer.....they give me money.

lenders.name: Gurtej
lenders.loan_because: I care greatly about the issue of global poverty and I believe that this can help me make a small contribution towards solving this enormous problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I study what makes certain countries rich and other countries poor - Political Economy of Economic Development.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: a friend gave a gift certificate...and it just keeps giving!

lenders.name: Chelsea
lenders.loan_because: I would like to share God's blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: GOD
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate Private

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: To help others in need
lenders.occupational_info: Promote my company

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to give back! It's not much, because I am a single mother, working and going to school, but I believe that every little bit I can share is well worth the sacrifice! If it helps someone attain their goals and dreams, it is money well spent!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant serving food. I raise two beautiful children and attend college with hopes of attending law school one day.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans seem to be a very effective way for me, as an individual, to make an impact in the lives of people in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: microcredit loans are people helping people make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a department of the government that mixes geographic data and information technology.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: We are all one nation under God.  We are all indivisible.

lenders.name: Givearn
lenders.loan_because: We at Givearn.com figured out a way to make others better off without making anyone worse off. Now that's what we call efficient!

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to be living in what is arguably the greatest country in the world and would like to be able to share in the driving spirit of those who aren't in as beneficial a place as I am yet continue striving to do their best under conditions which are oftentimes difficult to even imagine.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Repair

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org lets us give a hand up and not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet entrepreneur

lenders.name: Mr. Hayes
lenders.loan_because: We want to make difference by making other peoples' dreams come true.  We know that helping others will help ourselves feel better about our contribution.  We also want to make difference in the communities of third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Our two classes have been involved in raising money through bottle drives and other means to make a difference on a global scale.  We believe in the power of Random Acts of Kindness and want to improve the world in any way we can.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: the dreams of those who sleep upon feathers are not more beautiful than the dreams of those who sleep upon the earth.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the most dynamic and fastest growing place the world has ever seen, I try every day to keep up with advances and stay afloat whilst making the place faster and more exciting to those who come see it. My world is the internet, my toolbox is LAMP and my job is to help make my world more amazing. BTW, I believe communication is key to toppling corruption...Kiva is a part of this.

lenders.name: melanie
lenders.loan_because: if we all help each other we create a more positive environment for our children
lenders.occupational_info: i am a mom and wife trying to raise consciencious healthy kids

lenders.name: Yohanes
lenders.loan_because: I need money to grew my business. I need to buy some printing machinery.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as project and IT manager in an event organizer field.
But i really want to open my own business.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: This is my first time loaning.  I like the idea of helping others become self sufficient and to see their hard work pay off.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I teach students in the 3rd and 4th grade (ages 8-10 yrs. old).

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: If you give someone a fish you feed them for a meal.  Teach them to fish and feed them for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: As and entrepreneur and c.f.o. for my sons struggling construction business I know how scarry it can get. If we don't make it I hope someone out there does.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can all help one another out. By making a small loan through Kiva, I can be part of something bigger than myself.

lenders.name: angie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this organization and in helping the many who struggle to better their lives, support their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic designer, textile designer, jewelry designer, web designer,

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe building a business case around a social issue guarantees a solution will be found.  I believe free market capatalism is the best road to ending poverty. I believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the production, marketing and product development for a line of industrial valves...

lenders.name: Hanno
lenders.loan_because: I think people need to help each other out, and that it can be used to show God's love for every person on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the development of insurance administration system as a software engineer.

lenders.name: Terri Nakamura
lenders.loan_because: 33 years ago a bank made a loan to my small business. Since then I've done well so it's great to be able to help someone else now.
lenders.occupational_info: I create corporate identities and develop branding and design annual reports, brochures, web sites, magazines, product packaging and just about anything that visually communicates.

lenders.name: Online-Marketing-Agentur
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info:
http://www.spurtig.de
http://www.hsdpa-flatrate.de
http://www.funkster.de
http://www.mobil-telefonieren.de
http://www.rslcom.de

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help in some small way.

lenders.name: Phoenix Institute
lenders.loan_because: gives people opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of a tertiary college that teaches students to become counsellors and art therapist in Australia

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others not as fortunate as us Canadians.  Those who have the same work ethic, passion for life, and want to make something of themselves and their communities, they truly deserve my help.
lenders.occupational_info:
Inmates in Canada get 3 square meals a day, endless TV and movies, a clean warm bed to sleep in...yet they still complain relentlessly about being so hard done by!  They will never know the true hardship or struggle like those who live in a 3rd world country.   

Every time I donate, I feel I am correcting some bad karma.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because:
Being a Russian whose youth happened to be in the time of the collapse of the Soviet Union and of the resulting virtual demolition of the Russian economy, with people having no jobs, no money, no food and nowhere to turn to; having grown up through a lot of hardship - I was fortunate enough to get out of this unhappiness and poverty.
I want to help talented people around the world not to miss their chance in life. I always planned to start donating "somewhere in future" but justified not doing so with not making enough money yet. Kiva is a great tool to make something real right here right now, to trust through the traceability of each loan, to feel involved through progress reports, to be a part of the global team of people doing the same good thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Shell on international assignments, now in Norway. My idea is that driving economic progress is the foundation for the individual life improvement - poor people sruggle through life for food and basic needs but this is not and should not be the purpose of life. Multinational oil companies, no matter how rich they are blamed to be, stimulate economic growth in the countries they develop projects in- through brining technology, resources, market experience, money - the rest is up to the local goverments tfor channelling all those resources into the local development.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I was given a certificate to loan for my birthday.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people out who are less fortunate than myself. I was blessed to be born into a rich nation. While I did not grow up with a lot of money or status myself, I am now at a point where I am comfortable. I want to make that dream a reality for other people as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I schedule resources, manage budgets, and track activities towards completion for small scale and large scale HR projects!

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all people should have an opportunity to lead a happy and fulfilled life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes about critical thinking, society, and technology at a small college.

lenders.name: RAMARAO
lenders.loan_because: I want to join in the net programmes to earn more money.
lenders.occupational_info: Money making through online marketing

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.occupational_info: I run a 20-plex Cinema in the San Jose, California area.

lenders.name: Corene
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a student ran organization on our high school campus.  I teach students how to fundraise, and plan events. I love my job!

lenders.name: sai
lenders.loan_because: I had Huge loss in my business. I have to pay to the Financier.

lenders.name: Lucas
lenders.occupational_info: I script programs for Johnson & Johnson, so they can have the so called "Silent Installation". With that, users don't have to keep clicking 'next' to install programs and there won't be any signal in the computer that the program was installed, after the uninstall

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell people how they can improve what they're writing.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: "We all do better when we all are doing better".  This is a great opportunity to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and engineers. It's geeky fun and interesting.

lenders.name: DrewPaik
lenders.loan_because: I'd waste the money on something stupid otherwise.

lenders.name: Timo
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to be able to see directly where my money is going, and to know that that money is being used in a way that directly helps others.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because:
Because I am a follower of Jesus Christ.  Everything I am and have is a gift.   I am just a steward or a manager of some stuff God has entrusted to me to use for his Glory.

"Beware lest you say in your heart, 'My power and the might of my hand have gotten me this wealth.'   You shall remember the LORD your God, for it is he who gives you power to get wealth"  
Deuteronomy 8:17-18

lenders.name: Dario
lenders.loan_because: i am finally at the point where i can!

lenders.name: Earl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have less and are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I do woodworking.  I make wooden bowls and boxes. I give them to friends and family.

lenders.name: Chubb
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: David & Judith
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed with a good family income and believe in helping others to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We assist transportation (trucking) fleets software

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs help. In underdeveloped countries, making peanut butter, trying to feed their families on penny a day, they need our help. Love makes the world go round.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I, too, am an entrepreneur and want to help out fellow entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write professional resumes and help people to find their passion in a career.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a hand to people who work for what they want

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: because this is a great way of helping people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I  advise charities and not for profit organisations about  how the law affects them

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: It's something that can change peoples lives so dramatically, and it feels good to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist Veterinarians in all aspects of the hospital. Vaccinations, surgery, lab work, etc.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I believe that God wants us to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a lawyer who handles the purchase / sale of real estate

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!

lenders.name: Rosemary & Tommy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows us to touch the lives of people who are willing to work to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Barbara H
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped a lot in my life, I'd like to help someone else.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: someone once took a chance on me and now its time for me to pass that kindness on to others.  "Pay it forward" is a great statement.

lenders.name: RPCVs SierraLeone
lenders.loan_because: we want to remain connected to a place that is meaningful to us; and because we understand the power of this community of borrowers & lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of 79 returned Peace Corps Volunteers who served in Sierra Leone in the late 1960s.  The core of our group is made up by the l967 Chiefdom Development Program

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Its an amazing way to help people so far away.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a medical clinic helping people recover from injury and sickness.  I also am part of a team of people who create websites.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: our school got involved through a character education assembly.  If a sixth grade class can work to make 4 loans, I certainly can lend on my own too.

lenders.name: Brian, Maija & Vincenzo
lenders.loan_because: we believe two things will make the world a better place, better education for girls and boys and the economic empowerment of women.
lenders.occupational_info:
Brian -- grape farmer
Maija -- student/mother
Vincenzo -- son

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I really want to help others in other countries and a friend told me about this site. I love helping others.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to have the ability to help and believe it is important to make a positive impact in other peoples lives.  Little actions can make a world of difference!

lenders.name: Synovate Ltd. (Canada)
lenders.occupational_info: Synovate, the market research arm of Aegis Group plc, generates consumer insights that drive competitive marketing solutions. The network provides clients with cohesive global support and a comprehensive suite of research solutions. Synovate employs over 6,400 staff across 62 countries.

lenders.name: Rob W.
lenders.loan_because: it's good to be useful.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm also an entrepreneur --  I work almost completely online, designing and developing websites and software.  This has enabled me to explore and live in many parts of the world.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and because my birth/life has been very fortunate so I feel it is my duty to give to those whose birth/life is much less fortunate than my situation.   Who knows I may be an entrepreneur needing assistance in the next life...
lenders.occupational_info: I am in business to business print and direct mail sales.

lenders.name: Ian, Jo, Lily, Stanley
lenders.loan_because: The gap between the rich and the poor in this world is a scandal. The route out of poverty is often just a tiny amount of capital
lenders.occupational_info: We write and act and doctor

lenders.name: Leti, Karen, Aly & Katie
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a non-proft medical clinic that provides services at a reduced rate to people who may not otherwise have access to health care

lenders.loan_because: it is a very good project
lenders.occupational_info: i am a housemaker

lenders.name: Mark & Maude
lenders.loan_because: We don't have the resources of Gates and Buffet, but its nice to contribute a little bit.
lenders.occupational_info: We do medical research.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's the donation that never stops giving.
